commit.message:
Make-lang.in: Update dependencies

	* gcc-interface/Make-lang.in: Update dependencies

	* gcc-interface/Makefile.in: Add target pairs for PPC/Xenomai

From-SVN: r149689

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2009-07-15  Arnaud Charlet  <charlet@adacore.com>
+
+	* gcc-interface/Make-lang.in: Update dependencies
+
+	* gcc-interface/Makefile.in: Add target pairs for PPC/Xenomai
+
